description: Would rate higher if more people would play. It has a barrier to entry... keeps people away.

title: Haven't Pl...
description: Haven't Played Yet.

title: Available ...
description: Available on Steam - don't own but would consider it! Also here online but it's "premium" https://boardgamearena.com/gamepanel?game=raceforthegalaxy

title: If you've ...
description: If you've played San Juan (a good game), then this is one with similar mechanics, but with more cards, more mechanics, and a more exciting theme. What's not to like?The first few plays were frustrating, as I was learning the game and all its iconography. It's not as much fun when you feel rushed by those who choose their roles in two seconds every turn. Much more fun when some thought is put into it, and a few minutes are spent at the end reflecting on your galactic civilization. I have to give mention to the excellent artwork on every single card in this game. Very impressed!

title: 2-4 player...
description: 2-4 players, 30-45 minutes, medium heavy, deck buildingI love this game, especially with two players this is a fast deck building race game. No game is the same with different starting planets and so many cards that come along during the game. Most logged games are online (BGA), but this has also become one of the main fillers in our gaming group, especially for two of us, where we usually throw in one of the expansions.Trying to get my son (10) into playing this one as well

title: Absolutely...
description: Absolutely fantastic game which I cannot get enough of. Love trying different strategies, even the "under-powered" ones. Expansions should give this a very long life.

title: This is on...
description: This is one of those games that is incredibly difficult to get your head around at first.. but is actually pretty strait forward.I hated it the first few times I played it, but I have to say it's grown on me..

title: Getting ba...
description: Getting back into this after some tutelage from experienced players.  I'm going to teach it to bar night boys.[09-15-14] Weston really hated it!  I'm still having trouble getting my head that.

title: That MtG b...
description: That MtG bug just made me buy it. Sadly wife doesn't want to learn it while likeing San Juan. Missing quite a few plays before started recording

title: I really l...
description: I really like this game.  I taught my wife and now that she's over the learning curve she likes it a lot as well.Sometimes I wish it wasn't a race because I just want to keep building but I know there are other space empire games out there to scratch that itch.I love the stories that the artwork conveys.

title: Never gets...
description: Never gets old...too bad it's hard for new players to get into quickly due to all of the symbols.

title: Whenever I...
description: Whenever I play I forget that it has ZERO player interaction.

title: Best deck ...
description: Best deck building game I've ever seen.

title: Have playe...
description:
Have played about 300 times, it is my girfriend and my favorite game to play together.  The fact that it's a 20 minute game is also a very nice bonus.

It took me a while to see that there are player interactions and it's not just multiplayer solitaire, but I learned more as I played.

title: Love this ...
description: Love this game.  Look forward to adding expansions, but no real hurry as I'm still discovering new routes to victory (and defeat).

title: Much bette...
description: Much better than San Juan, and awfully pretty. Less complicated than it seems, too. It's incredibly fast, even with new players, and it's exceptionally fun. A real triumph.

title: Expansions...
description:
Expansions:
- The Gathering Storm
- Rebel vs Imperium

title: Secret San...
description:
Secret Santa Present 2013

Haven't played it in person yet, but I downloaded the computer version and love playing that.  I'm really looking forward to getting this on the table.

Update
Played it a whole bunch at MAGFest 2014 and I absolutely love it.  I understand the multiplayer solitaire issue, but if you put effort into trying to figure out what the other players are doing it becomes a little more interactive.

title: Yes, it's ...
description: Yes, it's complicated. Yes, the iconography is insane. But this game plays fast and offers tons of depth and replay value.

title: It looks d...
description:
It looks daunting, and the instructions aren't the most well-written ones I've seen. But once you figure this game out, it's fairly straight-forward, and a lot of fun! 

Also, despite being straight-forward, it's still open for a ton of strategy. Just the starting worlds lead me to using different tactics every time I play. Very happy with this purchase.

title: This is a ...
description: This is a game that always feels interesting and new.
